channel.title: On/off switch or reset button
channel.description:
Is there a way to connect an on/off switch to the Axoloti core? Are there connectors on the board I could use for this? I found this solution using a modified USB cable, but I was hoping for something a bit more elegant: http://community.axoloti.com/t/battery-powered-usb-in-switch-on-off-tutorial/6176
Or can I add a reset button via one of the digital GPIO pins? I couldn't find any objects that can tell the hardware to reboot and wouldn't know how to code my own (if that's even possible).

item.title: On/off switch or reset button
item.dc:creator: @Nosnibor
item.description:
@Nosnibor wrote:

The reset input is accessible at JP1 (the connector for SWD debugging). A button connecting pin 5(reset) and 3 (gnd) should work.
Though I wonder why one would need to reset/reboot the Axoloti.
